scenario.name: voip_probe_register_check
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 120 Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:{{SIP_DOMAIN}} SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}>;tag=[call_number] To: "{{CALLER_ID}}" <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@{{SIP_DOMAIN}}> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:{{CALLER_ID}}@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Authorization: [authentication username="{{SIP_LOGIN}}" password="{{SIP_PASSWORD}}"] Expires: 120 Content-Length: 0
